title: Is GARDASIL®9 (Human Papillomavirus 9-valent Vaccine, Recombinant) Appropriate for Me?
description: Learn about GARDASIL®9 (Human Papillomavirus 9-valent Vaccine, Recombinant), including dosing information, who should get vaccinated, and safety information. Please see Important Safety Information on this website.
cleaned_text: Learn about certain HPV-related cancers For most people, HPV clears on its own. But for those who don't clear the virus, HPV can lead to certain cancers. There's no way to know which people who have HPV will develop certain cancers. Talk with your doctor or find your nearest participating pharmacy They can help you decide if HPV vaccination is right for you. GARDASIL 9 is approved for appropriate adults through age 45. Find a pharmacy A pharmacist may be able to help you decide if HPV vaccination is right for you. Enter your ZIP code to find a pharmacy near you that offers GARDASIL 9.
